  • Constructor Details

    • Spo2Device

      public Spo2Device(android.content.Context context, android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter bluetoothAdapter, DataReciever reciever)
      Constructor for the Spo2Device class.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      bluetoothAdapter - The Bluetooth adapter used to initiate connections.
      reciever - The custom data receiver for handling incoming data.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Connecting to the SpO2 device using its predefined MAC address. Attempts to establish a GATT connection for further communication.

    • checkAndDiscoverServices

      private void checkAndDiscoverServices(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt)
      This discovers services on the connected GATT server, checking for the necessary Bluetooth permissions.
      Parameters:
      gatt - The GATT server instance.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the GATT connection to the SpO2 device.

    • setupCharacteristicNotification

      private void setupCharacteristicNotification(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt)
      It sets up notifications for the specified characteristic on the SpO2 service. This enables the app to receive updates when the characteristic value changes.
      Parameters:
      gatt - The GATT server instance.

    • handleCharacteristicData

      private void handleCharacteristicData(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      This handles the received data from the characteristic and processes it into readable values.
      Parameters:
      characteristic - The BluetoothGattCharacteristic containing the data.

    • processPacket

      private void processPacket(byte[] packet)
      It processes the incoming data packet and extracts SpO2, pulse rate, and PPG values. The data is then used to update the UI on the main activity.
      Parameters:
      packet - The byte array containing the data packet.

    • updateUI

      private void updateUI(int spo2, int pulseRate, int ppg)
      This is responsible for Updating the UI with the latest SpO2, pulse rate, and PPG values.
      Parameters:
      spo2 - The SpO2 value (blood oxygen saturation).
      pulseRate - The pulse rate (heartbeats per minute).
      ppg - The (PPG) value.
